first_run_switch.title: SWITCH
first_run_switch.message:
Are you willing to turn on Competitive Rules?
These Settings limit unfair gameplay, ensuring a fair match between both parties.
(Note: You can enable/disable these settings using through Settings/Rules CFG)

set_joystick_default.title: CONTROLLER SET TO DEFAULT
set_joystick_default.message: The Controls Have Been Set To Default

back_title.label: BACK TO TITLE?
back_title.txt: Go Back To The Title Screen?

stage_how_to_play.tips_4: Jump Button (Press while in the air for double jump)

tips.loading_config_fail: Game Start Failed: Failed To Load Settings File!

com_level.label: COM LEVEL
com_level.txt: Set The Level Of The Computer

sound.label: SOUNDS
sound.txt: Set The Level Of The Game Sounds.

bgm.label: BGM
bgm.txt: Set Level Of The Background Music

smooth_low_quality.label: SMOOTH LOW QUALITY
smooth_low_quality.txt: Make The Low Quality Sprites Smoother.

steel_body_freeze.label: STEEL BODY FREEZE
steel_body_freeze.txt: Add hitstop when an attack hits a Silver-Armor Attack

random_old_fighter.label: RANDOM OLD FIGHTER
random_old_fighter.txt: Toggle if old characters can be chosen when picking random select.

bankai.label: ALLOW BANKAI
bankai.txt: Set to whether you can transform during a match.

camera_zoom_rate.label: CAMERA ZOOM RATE
camera_zoom_rate.txt: Change the rate of speed for the camera zoom

infinite_atk_chk.label: *ANTI INFINITE
infinite_atk_chk.txt: Prevent players from having the same move be used twice in a combo.

replace_special.label: ALTERED CB INPUT
replace_special.txt: Use Combination for Special Moves（W/S + O）

assist.ogihci_vaste_lord: 天锁斩月 死神之力 完全虚化
assist.starrk_resurrection: 柯雅泰·史塔克 归刃
assist.aizen_muken: 蓝染·惣右介 无间封印
assist.sasuke_amenotejikara: 宇智波·佐助 天手力

ichigo.name: 黑崎·一护 始解
says: Fighting by itself is for nothing but survival.
I don't know why, but it all feels amazing!
It's terrifying because we can't see it.

ichigo_half_mask.name: 黑崎·一护 虚化暴走
says: Tell me, what is the difference between a king and a mount? |Don't tell me the difference between two feet and four feet!
There's only one answer, and that is instinct! |It is engraved on the oldest of beings, a thorough and incomparable murderous instinct!
What you lack is that, this raw instinct! |That's why you are weaker than me!

ichigo_bankai.name: Ichigo (Bankai)
says: Fighting by itself is for nothing but survival.
I don't know why, but it all feels amazing!
It's terrifying because we can't see it.

ichigo_hmb.name: 黑崎·一护 虚化暴走 卍解
says: Tell me, what is the difference between a king and a mount? |Don't tell me the difference between two feet and four feet!
There's only one answer, and that is instinct! |It is engraved on the oldest of beings, a thorough and incomparable murderous instinct!
What you lack is that, this raw instinct! |That's why you are weaker than me!

ichigo_vizard.name: 黑崎·一护 虚化 卍解
says: Fighting by itself is for nothing but survival.
I don't know why, but it all feels amazing!
It's terrifying because we can't see it.

ichigo_zero.name: 黑崎·一护
says: Fighting by itself is for nothing but survival.
I don't know why, but it all feels amazing!
It's terrifying because we can't see it.

ogihci.name: 斩月 死神之力
says: Tell me, what is the difference between a king and a mount? |Don't tell me the difference between two feet and four feet!
There's only one answer, and that is instinct! |It is engraved on the oldest of beings, a thorough and incomparable murderous instinct!
What you lack is that, this raw instinct! |That's why you are weaker than me!

ogihci_bankai.name: 天锁斩月 死神之力
says: Tell me, what is the difference between a king and a mount? |Don't tell me the difference between two feet and four feet!
There's only one answer, and that is instinct! |It is engraved on the oldest of beings, a thorough and incomparable murderous instinct!
What you lack is that, this raw instinct! |That's why you are weaker than me!

rukia.name: 朽木·露琪亚 义骸
says: Is reincarnation our fate? Or is it exaggerated? | If it is reincarnation, should the circle of reincarnation be destroyed? | Or should we accept it?
People can have hope because they don't know death.

rukia_shikai.name: Rukia Kuchiki (Shikai)
says: Is reincarnation our fate? Or is it exaggerated? | If it is reincarnation, should the circle of reincarnation be destroyed? | Or should we accept it?
People can have hope because they don't know death.

renji.name: Abarai Renji
says: I vowed to save her...I made this oath to nobody, just to me - my soul!
I shall put that unreachable fang in flames so that I need not look at that star, so that this throat will not be torn apart.
In fact, I'm very scared. Even though it looks like I'm follwing you closely and I'm ready to fight at any time,|I don't even dare to step on your shadow...|Actually, I' really scared...
Seeking fights... Before that, what did you want for... | Woohoo, tonight, I scream again.

renji_bankai.name: Abarai Renji (Bankai)
says: I vowed to save her...I made this oath to nobody, just to me - my soul!
I shall put that unreachable fang in flames so that I need not look at that star, so that this throat will not be torn apart.
In fact, I'm very scared. Even though it looks like I'm following you closely and I'm ready to fight at any time,|I don't even dare to step on your shadow...|Actually, I' really scared...
Seeking fights... Before that, what did you want for... | Woohoo, tonight, I scream again.

kenpachi.name: Zaraki Kenpachi
says: Come on, let's fight!
You're too afraid of death to fight.
Every time we turn away from self-esteem, we become more like beasts. |Every Heart Should Stay Away From The Beast.

ikkaku.name: Ikkaku
says: All of us, from the moment we're born, must die.
One who cannot go beyond death, has to understand something.
The end always exists before the beginning.

gin.name: Gin
says: I have nothing to say!
I'm sorry, Captain Aizen.
I just can't help it..

chad.name: Yasutora Sado (Chad)
says: I can still protect you, even without a sword in my hand.
If I keep holding a sword, I can't hold you tight.

sado_muerte.name: Yasutora Sado (La Muerte)
says: I can still protect you, even without a sword in my hand.
If I keep holding a sword, I can't hold you tight.

uryuu.name: Ishida Uryu
says: I swear on the pride of the Quincy, I will kill you!
Weakling...

uryuu_ginreigojiaku.name: Ishida Uryu (Ginrei Kojaku)
says: I swear on the pride of the Quincy, I will kill you!
Weakling...

toushirou.name: Toshiro Hitsugaya
says: Under the strong sunlight, the footprints printed on ice disappear without a trace. | Don't be afraid of tricks, this world is built on lies.
Don't call me Toshiro, my name is Captain Hitsugaya!
Not Even Close!

toushirou_bankai.name: Toshiro Hitsugaya (Bankai)
says: Under the strong sunlight, the footprints printed on ice disappear without a trace. | Don't be afraid of tricks, this world is built on lies.
Don't call me Toshiro, my name is Captain Hitsugaya!
Not Even Close!

byakuya.name: Byakuya
says: Too slow. Even your fall is like this.
Oh... I never thought that a normal person could understand the feelings of the nobles.
A person like you died a thousand years earlier under my power.

byakuya_bankai.name: Byakuya Kuchiki (Bankai)
says: Too slow. Even your fall is like this.
Oh... I never thought that a normal person could understand the feelings of the nobles.
A person like you died a thousand years earlier under my power.

ulquiorra.name: Ulquiorra Cifer
says: The Sun has been struck down by me.
I see everything.
Humanity, unpredictable creatures.

ulquiorra_murcielago.name: Ulquiorra Cifer (Murcielago)
says: The Sun has been struck down by me.
I see everything.
Humanity, unpredictable creatures.

aizen.name: Sosuke Aizen
says: At the beginning of the world, there were no truths, and there were no lies, only the facts seemed to exist.|However, all the things that existed in this world|will mistake the facts that are beneficial to themselves as true
A life without power is wasted!
You shouldn't judge the dead......
At your level, I won't allow you to betray me again!

The reason why we think the flowers on the rock wall are beautiful is that | we are standing on the rock wall,|you don’t have to be afraid, because we are like the flowers, and our roots have not fallen.

mayuri.name: Mayuri Kurotsuchi
says: I'm not interested in you anymore, so leave.
Oops, I wasted too much of my time.
The medicine is 8 times a day, and the machine experiment is 5 times a day, I will try to avoid killing you as much as possible.

orihime.name: Orihime
says: If I was a raindrop...|Then, could I connect to someone's heart as I connect the never-meeting sky and earth...|
If only we coul live five times. |That way I'd live in five different towns,|would have five different jobs...and fall in love with the same person five times.

grimmjow.name: Grimmjow Jeagerjaquez
says: It's not love, it's not light...Only destruction is proof of existence!
Ah hahahaha...This is just perfect, Soul Reaper, it's finally worth it killing you.
I don't understand, how could I lose to someone like you!

soifon.name: Soi Fon
says: Your shadow is like...a meaningless poisonous needle...stitching its way to my death.
Your light is like... the thunder that gently hit the water tower...and cut off my way of life.

starrk.name: Coyote Starrk
says: The unbearable loneliness sucks the bone and sucks the marrow, no matter what, you shouldn't be alone, even if you have to divide yourself in two.
I hate loneliness, but it follows me everywhere.

yoruichi.name: Yoruichi
says: If you lose now, there's no coming back.
Do you think this level of Shunpo can catch me? |If you want to catch me, just do it,|The speed of my Shunpo is not at a level that you can catch up with.
Don't take people too lightly, |I did give up the title of Squad Captain,|but I don't remember giving up any another name.

aizen_captain.name: Sosuke Aizen (Captain)
says: At the beginning of the world, there were no truths, and there were no lies, only the facts seemed to exist.|However, all the things that existed in this world|will mistake the facts that are beneficial to themselves as true
A life without power is wasted!
You shouldn't judge the dead......
At your level, I won't allow you to betray me again!

The reason why we think the flowers on the rock wall are beautiful is that | we are standing on the rock wall,|you don’t have to be afraid, because we are like the flowers, and our roots have not fallen.

tensa.name: 天锁斩月 灭却师之力
says: I don't want to protect them.
You have lost, you should breathe.
I, too, have something I want to protect.

dordoni.name: Dordoni Alessandro Del Socaccio
says: A pleasure to meet you!
What a shame that I can't fight you at your best!
This has really moved me.

urahara.name: Kisuke Urahara
says: Don't worry, I'll make a discount just for you!
Those who teeter on the edge will never be truly human, they're bound to be banned from the Soul Society.
Teeter on this edge,|nowhere to go, no place to go back to.

naruto.name: Naruto Uzumaki
says: As long as you're the best ninja in the village, you can become Hokage!
I'll never give up, because that is my ninja way!
Alright! I've taken a path I believe in, to live without regrets!

naruto_ver1.name: 漩涡·鸣人 尾兽外衣
says: 只要你变成全村人都认可的最棒忍者，|你就可以把火影这个名字抢过来！
我是绝对不会放弃的，因为这就是我的忍道！
好！我决定了,我要走一条属于我自己的忍道,|朝着绝对不让自己后悔的道路一直大步的走下去！

naruto_ver2.name: 漩涡·鸣人 尾兽化暴走

naruto_sennin.name: 漩涡·鸣人 仙人模式
says: As long as you're the best ninja in the village, you can become Hokage!
I'll never give up, because that is my ninja way!
Alright! I've taken a path I believe in, to live without regrets!

naruto_kyubi.name: 漩涡·鸣人 九尾查克拉模式
says: As long as you're the best ninja in the village, you can become Hokage!
I'll never give up, because that is my ninja way!
Alright! I've taken a path I believe in, to live without regrets!

sakura.name: Sakura
says: I am always being protected by others, so I'm not in balance...Since this is the case, this time...I must be the one who protects those I cherish...
I've always...wished I could be a powerful ninja...

sasuke.name: Sasuke
says: Too many limitations will only make us lose ourselves.
My loneliness is not comparable to being sad after being blamed for the death of your own parents.
I am an avenger, I was born in revenge, and in revenge I'll lose everything.

sasuke_juin.name: Sasuke Uchiha (Curse Mark)
says: Too many limitations will only make us lose ourselves.
My loneliness is not comparable to being sad after being blamed for the death of your own parents.
I am an avenger, I was born in revenge, and in revenge I'll lose everything.

sasuke_taka.name: Sasuke Uchiha (Akatsuki)
says: Too many limitations will only make us lose ourselves.
My loneliness is not comparable to being sad after being blamed for the death of your own parents.
I am an avenger, I was born in revenge, and in revenge I'll lose everything.

sasuke_susanoo.name: Sasuke Uchiha (Eternal Mangekyo Sharingan)
says: Too many limitations will only make us lose ourselves.
My loneliness is not comparable to being sad after being blamed for the death of your own parents.
I am an avenger, I was born in revenge, and in revenge I'll lose everything.

karin.name: Karin
says: Sasuke, I want to be with him...
I really want to see him again...
Sasuke, where are you? Wait for me...

juggo.name: Jugo
says: HAHAHAHAHAHA!
I won't lose control again.

itachi.name: Itachi Uchiha
says: Excellence can be quite annoying...
This is the truth of humanity, who think they know what they know, deny what they do not know, but only think they are in the right...

As long as people are living by their own knowledge and beliefs and are bound by them,|that's what we call reality. |However, knowledge and belief are ambiguous things, and reality may be just an illusion.

deidara.name: Deidara
says: Art is an explosion! Hmm.
My entrance is art! Hmm.
Art is a fleeting beauty, the moment it disappears, it's called beautiful. Hmm.

sasori.name: Sasori
says: Undying, Art is an eternal beauty.
If you want to struggle against me, there's nothing to do,|I'll turn you into a ghost with my collection!
I hate others, and I don't like anyone either! |I'll fix you right up!

kakashi.name: Kakashi Hatake
says: Ninjas can't think with common sense!
Don't worry, I will protect you even if I die. I will never let my partners die.
You can't beat me now, you don't understand what real strength is!

kakashi_kamui.name: Kakashi Hatake (Kamui)
says: Ninjas can't think with common sense!
Don't worry, I will protect you even if I die. I will never let my partners die.
You can't beat me now, you don't understand what real strength is!

lee.name: Rock Lee
says: The Lotus of Konoha will bloom again, and I will become stronger!
If you can't do 500 push-ups, you jump-rope 1200 times! If you can't do that, then you'll kick wood 2000 times!
I'm gonna prove that even without ninjutsu or genjutsu you can still be a great ninja! That's my life, and it is my ninja way!
If you're in danger, I'll protect you with my life. I've said this before, I'll protect you until the end.

lee_tomon.name: Rock Lee (Inner Gates)
says: The Lotus of Konoha will bloom again, and I will become stronger!
If you can't do 500 push-ups, you jump-rope 1200 times! If you can't do that, then you'll kick wood 2000 times!
I'm gonna prove that even without ninjutsu or genjutsu you can still be a great ninja! That's my life, and it is my ninja way!
If you're in danger, I'll protect you with my life. I've said this before, I'll protect you until the end.

neji.name: Neji
says: I don't think this is the end!
From birth, a person's destiny is decided until the end.
Your destiny was sealed the moment I became your opponent.

gaara.name: Gaara
says: Is that all you can do?

temari.name: Temari
says: Idiot!
Hmph! Vulnerable!

jiraiya.name: Jiraiya
says: Regardless of whether it is north, south, east, or west, the entire world has the invincible white-haired Sannin toad messenger.
For a ninja, it doesn't matter how you live, but how you die is the most important thing.
A ninja is a person that can endure everything.

orochimaru.name: Orochimaru
says: The deal is just a trick to paralyze the opponent, and history will be rewritten from now on!
The tangible things will perish sooner or later, but the invisible things last forever.
Physical life is too short...too temporary...

killerbee.name: Killer Bee
says: You fool, you're a damn idiot!
Who's the best! I am the best! Who's the best!
Yo! You're a fool, you're an idiot! Yo!

obito.name: Masked Obito
says: People who don't value their friends are lower than scum!
The more brutal the life, the greater is the hole in the heart.
There is no difference between hope and delusion in this world, |it's no more than a horrible rhetoric.
I am someone nobody wants to become...

obito_trueColors.name: Obito (Unmasked)
says: People who don't value their friends are lower than scum!
The more brutal the life, the greater is hole in the heart.
There is no difference between hope and delusion in this world, |it's no more than a horrible rhetoric.
I am someone nobody wants to become...

madara.name: Madara
says: The current me doesn't have the same strength, in other words, right now this is just a shell.
Everything in the world is me, and I am all of the world.
The legend has become reality.
Your attacks have no effect on me.
Well, I hereby declare war on you all, the Fourth Great Ninja War!
To control others, you must know the darkness of their hearts.

kimimaro.name: Kimimaro
says: Well, how would you like to die?
We are born for a reason, and I firmly believe that there is an important reason to stay alive.

Maybe it's true... My body is sick and won't last much longer... But, I won't die... And I'm not alone... As someone who takes part in Orochimaru-sama's ambition...I will live forever in Orochimaru-sama's heart...

kimimaro_goninshu.name: 君麻吕 音忍五人众
says: 好吧，想怎么个死法？
人是为了某种目的而降生的，我坚信，活着便有重要的使命。
也许的确是这样…我的身体病魔缠身，不能坚持很久…但是，我不会灭亡…而且我不是一个人…作为担当起大蛇丸大人一部分野心的人…我将在大蛇丸大人的心中永存…

sakura_byakugo.name: Sakura Haruno (Byakugo)
says: I am always being protected by others, so I'm not in balance...Since this is the case, this time...I must be the one who protects those I cherish...
I've always...wished I could be a powerful ninja...

hinata.name: Hinata Hyuuga
says: In front of the one I love...I can't afford to lose...
Never give up, that is my ninja way. !There are words I can say, and that is my way.
People are not perfect……so……| A person must have the strength to rise up despite their failures!

suigetsu.name: Suigetsu Hozuki
says: A god of ninjas...how undignified...
What is our relationship?
Twice In A Row!

kabuto.name: Kabuto
says: If you think you can get rid of me with ninjutsu of this level, you underestimated me...
You don't know who he really is.
Do you understand the pain of being nobody?

kabuto_s.name: Kabuto (Sage)
says: If you think you can get rid of me with ninjutsu of this level, you underestimated me...
You don't know who he really is.
Do you understand the pain of being nobody?

kakashi_gsw.name: Kakashi Hatake (Genjutsu World)
says: Ninjas can't think with common sense!
Don't worry, I will protect you even if I die. I will never let my partners die.
You can't beat me now, you don't understand what real strength is!

onoki.name: Onoki
says: .......Awaken.
This is all for peace.
I want to pick up the me I left behind here!

kenshin.name: 绯村·剑心 浪客
says: The sword is a murder weapon, swordsmanship is a way to kill, | no matter what pretty language is used to cover it up, that is the truth.
Although it's just a sword, it's enough to protect....those around me.
You have been taking care of me all this time, thank you so much, I am a wanderer, and I will walk the road again...
What the dead want to see most is not that their relatives avenging them, but them living happily.
It's not the sword what starts a new era, but the people who use it.
I am still Kenshin Himura, and this fact will never change!
I don't kill anymore and don't allow anyone to kill. You don't get to kill anymore!
This isn't a break; it's not an end; it is not an end, but a start......you may feel unsatisfied, but this is the end of it...
You must always be serious, otherwise, your opponent won't feel that...what you say is real.
Our will to survive is the strongest thing there is!
Dedicate your heart to the sword, this is the answer I found!

kenshin_battousai.name: Kenshin Himura (Battousai)
says: The sword is a murder weapon, swordsmanship is a way to kill, | no matter what pretty language is used to cover it up, that is the truth.
Although it's just a sword, it's enough to protect....those around me.
You have been taking care of me all this time, thank you so much, I am a wanderer, and I will walk the road again...
What the dead want to see most is not that their relatives avenging them, but them living happily.
It's not the sword what starts a new era, but the people who use it.
I am still Kenshin Himura, and this fact will never change!
I don't kill anymore and don't allow anyone to kill. You don't get to kill anymore!
This isn't a break; it's not an end; it is not an end, but a start......you may feel unsatisfied, but this is the end of it...
You must always be serious, otherwise, your opponent won't feel that...what you say is real.
Our will to survive is the strongest thing there is!
Dedicate your heart to the sword, this is the answer I found!

Oh... I never thought that a normal person could understand the feelings of the nobles.
A person like you died a thousand years earlier under my power.

ichigo_vizard_old.name: [旧版·Ⅰ] 黑崎·一护 虚化 卍解
says: Fighting by itself is for nothing but survival.
I don't know why, but it all feels amazing!
It's terrifying because we can't see it.

ogihci_old.name: [旧版] 斩月 死神之力
says: Tell me, what is the difference between a king and a mount? |Don't tell me the difference between two feet and four feet!
There's only one answer, and that is instinct! |It is engraved on the oldest of beings, a thorough and incomparable murderous instinct!
What you lack is that, this raw instinct! |That's why you are weaker than me!

naruto_ver2_old.name: [旧版] 漩涡·鸣人 尾兽化暴走
says: 只要你变成全村人都认可的最棒忍者，|你就可以把火影这个名字抢过来！
我是绝对不会放弃的，因为这就是我的忍道！
好！我决定了,我要走一条属于我自己的忍道,|朝着绝对不让自己后悔的道路一直大步的走下去！

sasuke_susanoo_old_new.name: [Old; Revamp] Sasuke Uchiha (Eternal Mangekyo Sharingan)
says: Too many limitations will only make us lose ourselves.
My loneliness is not comparable to being sad after being blamed for the death of your own parents.
I am an avenger, I was born in revenge, and in revenge I'll lose everything.

ichigo_bankai_old.name: [Old] Ichigo Kurosaki (Bankai)
says: Fighting by itself is for nothing but survival.
I don't know why, but it all feels amazing!
It's terrifying because we can't see it.

deidara_old_new.name: [Old; Revamp] Deidara
says: Art is an explosion! Hmm.
My entrance is art! Hmm.
Art is a fleeting beauty, the moment it disappears, it's called beautiful. Hmm.

itachi_old_new.name: [Old; Revamp] Itachi Uchiha
says: Excellence can be quite annoying...
This is the truth of humanity, who think they know what they know, deny what they do not know, but only think they are in the right...

As long as people are living by their own knowledge and beliefs and are bound by them,|that's what we call reality. |However, knowledge and belief are ambiguous things, and reality may be just an illusion.

toushirou_bankai_old.name: [Old] Toshiro Hitsugaya (Bankai)
says: Under the strong sunlight, the footprints printed on ice disappear without a trace. | Don't be afraid of tricks, this world is built on lies.
Don't call me Toshiro, my name is Captain Hitsugaya!
Not Even Close!

suigetsu_old.name: [Old] Suigetsu Hozuki
says: A god of ninjas...how undignified...
What is our relationship?
Twice In A Row!

ichigo_vizard_old_new.name: [旧版·Ⅱ] 黑崎·一护 虚化 卍解
says: Fighting by itself is for nothing but survival.
I don't know why, but it all feels amazing!

hinata_old.name: [Old] Hinata Hyuuga
says: In front of the one I love...I can't afford to lose...
Never give up, that is my ninja way. !If you have something to say, you should say it, that is also my ninja way.
People are not perfect……so……| A person must have the strength to rise up despite their failures!

hinata_old_new.name: [Old; Revamp] Hinata Hyuuga
says: In front of the one I love...I can't afford to lose...
Never give up, that is my ninja way. !If you have something to say, you should say it, that is also my ninja way.
People are not perfect……so……| A person must have the strength to rise up despite their failures!

sakura_byakugo_old.name: [Old] Sakura Haruno (Byakugo)
says: I am always being protected by others, so I'm not in balance...Since this is the case, this time...I must be the one who protects those I cherish...
I've always...wished I could be a powerful ninja...

madara_old.name: [Old] Madara
says: The current me doesn't have the same strength, in other words, right now this is just a shell.
Everything in the world is me, and I am all of the world.
The legend has become reality.
Your attacks have no effect on me.
Well, I hereby declare war on you all, the Fourth Great Ninja War!
To control others, you must know the darkness of their hearts.

yoruichi_old.name: [Old] Yoruichi Shihoin
says: If you lose now, you aren't coming back.
Do you really think this Flash Step can catch me? |If you want to catch me, just do it,|My Flash Step is beyond what you can catch up with.
Don't underestimate people, |I gave up the title of Squad Captain,|but I don't remember giving up any another name.

rukia_shikai_old.name: [Old] Rukia Kuchiki (Shikai)
says: Is reincarnation our fate? Or is it exaggerated? | If it is reincarnation, should the cycle of reincarnation be destroyed? | Or should we just accept it?
People believe because they don't know death.

onoki_old.name: [Old] Onoki
says: ......Wake up.
This is all for the sake of peace.
I want to pick the me I once left back up!

orochimaru_old.name: [Old] Orochimaru
says: This deal is just a trick to stop the opponent, and history will be remade from now on!

A body's life is too short....too limited...
